Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too abrupt and a quite pale film.

But it remains an important title to understand French and English colonial mentality at that time. And according to my boyfriend who studied this colonial period for his researches, “A seamless source !” as he puts it.

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they find. Water polluted and irradiated cannot be safe to drink.
